rom:
0001100000000110 - 00: MOV R0, #6
1111100100011100 - 02: OUT [R0], #0x0F
0001100000001000 - 04: MOV R0, #8
1111100000000100 - 06: OUT [R0], #1
0001101000000010 - 08: MOV R2, #0x02
1111000100000001 - 0A: IN R1, [R0]
0111000100101000 - 0C: AND R1, R1, R2
0000111111101001 - 0E: JEQ #-6
1111111111111111 - 10: HALT
